senses.sense_definition: A female given name from Japanese.

examples.text: My friend <w>Hikari</w> is coming to visit us from Tokyo next week.
The name <w>Hikari</w> means light in Japanese and is quite popular.

senses.sense_definition: A specific high-speed passenger train service on the Japanese Shinkansen network.

examples.text: We decided to take the <w>Hikari</w> because it stops at fewer stations than the Kodama.
Travelers with a rail pass often use the <w>Hikari</w> to travel between major cities.
